pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Dash Enterprise AuthAuthentication for apps deployed to [Dash Enterprise](https://plotly.com/dash)Learn more at https://dash.plotly.com/dash-enterprise/app-authentication```pyimport dash_enterprise_auth as auth@callback(...)def private_data(...): username = auth.get_username() if username: return get_view_for_user(username) else: return public_view()```
